installation-note: copy this file into your savegame folder as 'gamedata/savegame/{worldname}/chatcolors.json' (remove 'example' from filename)
hint1: To use a chat __name__ color for a specific person/group add permission 'mods.scarabol.commands.betterchat.name.red' to it
hint2: To use a chat __text__ color for a specific person/group add permission 'mods.scarabol.commands.betterchat.text.red' to it
